Posts.Content: hi all , i finished my treatment last july (radiotheraphy) which went well , just made sure area was creamed well, i started mine 6 months after chemo as had surgery in april last year , my RT lasted 37 seconds took longer to get dressed.(LOL).Does anyone know how long the waiting list is for reconstruction !!!!!! joanne xx
